mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO cb_report_boss_org_merchant ( report_date, report_beg_date, report_end_date, create_time, client_id, org_code, org_name, addnew_group_count, total_group_count, addnew_preferent_count, total_preferent_count ) VALUES
(#{item.reportDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.reportBegDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.reportEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.addnewGroupCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.totalGroupCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.addnewPreferentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.totalPreferentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select:
SELECT id, report_date, report_beg_date, report_end_date, create_time, client_id, org_code, org_name, addnew_group_count, total_group_count, addnew_preferent_count, total_preferent_count FROM cb_report_boss_org_merchant
client_id = #{clientId} AND report_date = #{reportDate}
